title: Pick Up Lines 12
overview: Xena cruises through Beverly Hills with Peter North in his new BMW. Pretty soon, Xena is so turned on that she decides to shift the gears. . . the ones belonging to Peter. She starts giving him a blowjob, and Peter can't get home fast enough so he can take Xena into the bedroom for some additional fun!  Finally, Peter and Xena team back up for one final session, which concludes with Peter shooting his cream all over Xena's willing face!
